channel.title: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie
channel.description:
Just giving a shout out to Benny Fortman's quasi-new Team Fortress 2 machinima - Fort Team Charlie - which is somewhat of a continuation of the brilliant Halo machinima Fire Team Charlie. It is among the best, full fledged machinima work done in the Source engine. Status of the web show can be seen here:
[url]https://www.facebook.com/pages/Fort-Team-Charlie/134496596592711[/url]
Part 1 of the first episode can be seen here:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZkJ9ieeIyQ[/url]
Please check it out. Lot of work was clearly put into it, and I think it would be a shame for it not to get the proper amount of attention.
![](upload://l4mYOw6EfJQqy0UlrC33imfbz8z.jpeg)

item.title: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie
item.dc:creator: UltraPic
item.description:
It’s like red vs blue, only worse.

Read full topic
item.source: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie

item.title: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
I thought It was amazing. Exactly the level of storytelling this rich complex game world that TF2 has deserves. Not Piles upon piles of hats and pseudo economics tagged with them. Hell I doubt any of the more recent players can tell were that lazer gun model comes from in the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie

item.title: Team Fortress 2 Machinima: Fort Team Charlie
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I found it a bit boring, but it was definitely well put together. I’ll look at more of his stuff later.

Read full topic
